title: aruL puri
sahitya:
aruL puri ainkaranE madam pozhiyum Anai mukhanE karuNA haranE tiruv-


anupallavi

  iruL mayamAm bhuvi vAzhvinilE unadiNaiyadiyaladoru tuNai ariyEn tiruv-


caraNam    OmkAra rUpA gaNanAyakA umai magizh mahanE vinAyakA
nIngAdenadu nenja AlayattilE nI enrum tuNai ninru inbam tandE tiruv-
